name: Flappy Penguin (Jack3G)
description:
Flappy Penguin

A Flappy Bird clone, made in Godot.

**NOTE FOR FIREFOX USERS** Because this was made in Godot 4 (beta 10) the web version doesn't work on firefox for now, unless you follow this short guide.

I don't actually expect that anyone would want to play this, but I'm posting this just in case anyone out there REALLY wants to be a penguin flying through a cave with a jet pack. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

I made this for the 20 Games Challenge, and it's open source! Available here.
